title: ESC 2021: Bayer's Kerendia touts outcomes data as it looks to complement J&J, AZ drugs
author: Kevin Dunleavy
description: When Bayer unveiled early-stage results from a finerenone trial at the European Society of Cardiology Congress in 2014, the company declared it was going all in on the kidney disease drug. | Bayer's chronic kidney disease drug Kerendia totted up kidney and cardiovascular outcomes wins in two massive trials at the European Society of Cardiology Congress on Saturday. While its efficacy figures fall short of rivals such as AstraZeneca's Farxiga and Johnson & Johnson's Invokana, Bayer believes Kerendia can add its own benefits.
